rules.description: Lofree Mouse Moving Spaces (Desktops)
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Change return to control if pressed with other keys, to return if pressed alone
Change spacebar to left_option if pressed with other keys (Post spacebar when pressed alone)
Post caps_lock if left_control is pressed alone.
Change shift + delete to forward delete (rev 2)
Numeric Keypad Mode [right_command as 0]
Numeric Keypad Trigger [Escape as trigger key]
Change right_shift to caps_lock if pressed alone
Change Fn + h/j/k/l to Arrows
Lofree Mouse Moving Spaces (Desktops)

Change return to control if pressed with other keys, to return if pressed alone
Change spacebar to left_option if pressed with other keys (Post spacebar when pressed alone)
Post caps_lock if left_control is pressed alone.
Change shift + delete to forward delete (rev 2)
Numeric Keypad Trigger [Escape as trigger key]
Numeric Keypad Mode [right_command as 0]
Change right_shift to caps_lock if pressed alone
Change Fn + h/j/k/l to Arrows
